ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure where lvl 24 could make this kind of money, I don t think anywhere to be honest. Mu ... From: Su [mailto:suceress@subdimension.com] Sent: Monday,
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure where lvl 24 could make this kind of money, I don't think anywhere
to be honest.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 11:53 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale


Ooh. Really? Where can a lvl 24 cleric make money like that?
luv,
-Su


> What a rip though. $150 US for 10,000pp??!?! So your telling me I can
make
> $450 US a day playing EQ? Thats crazy if anyone would pay that much. I
> know of one spot where you can easily farm 30k pp a day if not more, seems
a
> bit crazy to me,
>
> Mu
